ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Power Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in Power Armor technology allow for production of highly technological and more heavily armored suits. Allows you to build X-01 Power Armor

ResearchProjectDef.label: Energy Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: High powered beams of pure energy focused through lenses and superheated plasma passed down a superconducting shaft could prove effective in weaponry. Allows you to build basic energy weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Specialized Energy Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using more percise focuses and stronger magnets energy weapons can output far more energy in weapons specialized for different roles. Allows you to build the special energy weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fabric Augmentation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advancements in tailoring have allowed you to reach Vault-Tech's safety standards for clothing. Allows you to craft Vault Jumpsuits.
